search.placeholder: What can we help you with?

password.question: How do I reset my password?
password.answer: To reset your password, go to the login screen and click "Forgot Password". We'll send a reset link to your registered email. Follow the instructions to set a new password.

settings.question: Where can I find my account settings?
settings.answer: You can access your account settings by clicking on your avatar in the top-right corner of the site and selecting "Settings". From there, you can update your profile, email, and preferences.

support.question: How to contact customer support?
support.answer: Click the "Contact Support" button at the bottom of this page or go to our Support Center. You can open a ticket for technical issues, billing inquiries, or report a player.

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We support major credit/debit cards, PayPal, Google Pay, and Apple Pay. Regional payment options are also available depending on your location.

technical.question: How to report a technical issue?
technical.answer: To report a bug or technical issue, visit the "Technical Help" section, describe the issue in detail, and attach screenshots or logs if available. Our team will review and respond as quickly as possible.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy policy
privacyPolicy.intro: This Privacy Policy outlines how data is collected, used, and protected across all features of TZone — including player profiles, tournament participation, KYC verification (for organizers), and marketplace interactions.

collected.title: 1. Whatʼs Collected
collected.description: TZone may collect the following data based on how the platform is used:

account.title: 2. Account & Profile Data
items: Username, email, encrypted password
Display name, region, age, profile image
Public/private visibility preferences (for earnings, skill, badges, and stats)

game.title: 3. Game & Match Data
items: Connected accounts (Steam, Riot, EA, etc.)
Match history, win/loss rate, clutch moments
Skill-based matchmaking rating (E-Score)

organizer.title: 4. Organizer & KYC Data
items: Business verification details: license, tax ID, banking info
Custom branding elements for event hosting
Tournament history, payout records, sponsorship uploads

usage.title: 5. Usage & Platform Activity
items: XP earned, achievements, badges, titles
Tournament results, participation, referrals
Wallet earnings: tournament prizes, tips, affiliate revenue

device.title: 6. Device & Security Info
items: Device ID, browser type, IP address
Login logs and fraud-detection metadata
2FA setup (email, SMS, authenticator apps)

usageOfData.title: 7. How Your Data is Used
usageOfData.description: Your data supports the following platform operations:
items: Creating and managing secure player and organizer accounts
Verifying eligibility for tournaments, leaderboards, and prize earnings
Enabling automated matchmaking and fraud prevention
Displaying stats, profile achievements, and wallet dashboards
Delivering communications related to matches, reports, and product drops
Supporting moderator reviews for reports, bans, or disputes

protection.title: 8. How Your Data is Protected
protection.description: TZone applies strong security protocols to protect all collected information:
items: All passwords and personal data are encrypted in storage
Secure connections (HTTPS) are enforced platform-wide
Sensitive access (e.g., KYC) is permission-restricted
Admin actions are logged and reviewed
Optional 2FA is supported to help protect access

sharing.title: 9. When Data is Shared
sharing.description: TZone does not sell your personal information. Limited sharing may occur to operate core services:
items: With tournament partners or payout services (to deliver rewards or verify entries)
With payment processors and wallet services (to fulfill withdrawals or purchases)
With moderation or legal channels (to address serious policy violations)

rights.title: 10. Your Rights and Controls
rights.description: Users can manage and control data usage through profile settings:
items: View, edit, or delete account and game-linked info
Adjust privacy settings on profile visibility
Request data exports or permanent deletion
Choose communication preferences (unsubscribe links included)
